parameters.definition: Phone production per day by a rural factory
Phone production per day by an urban factory
Minimum required phone production per day

description: A cell phone company is building rural and urban factories. A rural factory can make \param{ProdRural} phones per day and requires \param{MgrsRural} managers. An urban factory can make \param{ProdUrban} phones per day and requires \param{MgrsUrban} managers. The company has available \param{TotalMgrs} managers and must make at least \param{MinPhones} phones per day. How many of each factory type should be built to minimize the total number of factories?
